content: That's really helpful, thank you! I think I have a good idea of where to start with my Reel series on self-care and mindfulness. I'm excited to create content that will provide value to my audience and help them develop healthy habits and routines. I'm also thinking about how I can tie in my consistent posting schedule and engaging content to attract new followers and increase engagement on my Instagram account. In fact, I've already seen some growth on Instagram, with 6 new followers in the last two weeks, which I attribute to my consistent posting schedule and engaging content.
